Place: VNR VJIET Basketball Court, Bachupally, Hyderabad, Telangana, India
history: The VNR VJIET Basketball Court was established to promote sports and fitness among the students of VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology. The court has been a hub for basketball enthusiasts to hone their skills and participate in inter-college tournaments. It has witnessed numerous intense matches and memorable victories over the years.
Ecological Relevance: The basketball court provides a space for students to engage in physical activity, promoting a healthy lifestyle among the youth. It also serves as a platform for fostering teamwork, discipline, and sportsmanship.

timeline.Details: The VNR VJIET Basketball Court was constructed as part of the institute's sports infrastructure.
The court hosted its first inter-college basketball tournament, bringing together teams from various institutions.
VNR VJIET's basketball team emerged victorious in the state-level competition held at the court.
The court underwent renovations to improve facilities and enhance the playing experience for the students.
A dedicated coaching and training program was initiated to nurture budding basketball talent at the institute.
The court proudly hosted the annual 'VNR Cup' inter-department basketball championship, showcasing the skills of students from different academic disciplines.
Despite the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic, virtual basketball challenges and training sessions were organized to keep the spirit of the sport alive among the students.
The VNR VJIET Basketball Court continues to be a vibrant hub of sporting activity, fostering a sense of community and camaraderie among the students.
